songs.title: Fallin’ (Ali Soundtrack Version)
songs.album: Songs in A Minor (10th Anniversary Edition) [Collector’s Edition]
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh-hoo-hoo, fallin'
In and out of love, with my baby
I love him
Say mmm-hmm

[Verse 1]
Feel good
Sometimes I feel used
Lovin' you, ooh-hoo-hoo
I'm so confused

[Pre-Chorus]
Fallin', uh-huh
Oh, fallin', uh-huh
Ooh..

[Verse 2]
Never felt this way
Oh, so much pleasure
So much pain
Just when I think
I'm such a fool
I start, ooh-hoo-hoo
All over again with you

[Break]
Ohh, Ohh

[Pre-Chorus]
Fallin', uh-huh
Oh, fallin', uh-huh, uh-huh
I, I, I, I'm fallin'
I, I, I, I'm fallin'
Fall, fall, fall
Fall...

[Chorus]
I keep on fallin' in and out
Of love with you
I never loved someone
The way that I loved you
I'm fallin' in and out
Of love with you
I never loved someone
The way that I loved you

[Outro]
I'm fallin' in and out
Of love with you
I never loved someone
The way that I loved you
